channel.title: Current on The Vera-Licona Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Current on The Vera-Licona Lab

item.title: Paola Vera-Licona
item.description: Dr. Vera-Licona is the group leader of the Computational Systems Medicine Lab at the Center for Quantitative Medicine UConn Health. She has extensive experience in the development and application of mathematical and computational tools for the modeling, simulation, analysis and control of biological networks. She is an interdisciplinary scientist, with a background in mathematics and computational systems biology. CV

item.title: Lauren Marazzi
item.description: Lauren is an MD/PhD student from the University of Connecticut School of Medicine. She is working on quantitative analysis of cancer reversion through mathematical control approaches.

item.title: Maddie Gastonguay
item.description: Maddie is a UConn Honors Program student doing major in Applied Mathematics and a minor in Bioinformatics and French.

item.title: Catherine Qiu
item.description: Catherine is a pre-med student pursuing a double degree in Molecular & Cell Biology and Mathematics-Statistics.
